actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the pay savings provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide that in applying the 2-year continuous work requirement in the case of an employee being reduced in grade there shall be disregarded periods of service in a different agency or in a lower grade caused by a reduction in force.

summary.text: Revises the continuous service prerequisite for the continuation of the basic pay rate of Federal employees who are reduced in grade by disregarding periods of service in a different agency or in a lower grade caused by a reduction in force.

titles.title: A bill to amend the pay savings provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide that in applying the 2-year continuous work requirement in the case of an employee being reduced in grade there shall be disregarded periods of service in a different agency or in a lower grade caused by a reduction in force.
